Reply.name: Dynamic00
Reply.text: Hello, traveler!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000020
Reply.text: Sorry, I came to the wrong place.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_plYes0
Reply.text: I agree!

Reply.name: Dynamic00_plNo0
Reply.text: I'd rather not.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Destroy00
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Destroy00_npc0
Reply.text: A thief that was caught several times started his illicit activity once again. Probably, the only way to make him stop stealing is to kill him. Help us and we'll reward you with %3d coins.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Destroy01
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Destroy01_npc0
Reply.text: We noticed somebody burning our crops and poisoning wells. Kill the enemy saboteur to get %3d in reward.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Destroy02
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Destroy02_npc0
Reply.text: Some crazy murderer is haunting our lands. Get us rid of his foul presence and receive %3d coins in reward.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Reach00
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Reach00_npc0
Reply.text: We collected several pieces of precious machinery. Deliver them to %2n. Local technicians will pay %3d coins for your work.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Reach01
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Reach01_npc0
Reply.text: Please deliver this package to %2n. It is a sign of our respect to its people. They will gladly pay you %3d coins for your services.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Convoy00
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Convoy00_npc0
Reply.text: It is dangerous to travel alone. A friend of mine really needs to go to %2n. Make sure he reaches it safely and you'll get %3d coins.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Convoy01
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Convoy01_npc0
Reply.text: Some local guy is establishing a trade route with %2n. Rivals want to spoil his plan. Help him to get to his destination safely and %3d coins are yours.

Reply.name: EndDlg1
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: EndDlg2
Reply.text: Any news?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000017
Reply.text: Can you believe it, everything is OK! So your services are not needed at the moment.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000018
Reply.text: It's a pity. Well, I'll come again later

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Peace00
Reply.text: I've got a problem: I fell out with %2b clan...

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Peace00_npc0
Reply.text: You did a hard job making %2b hate you! I have a couple of acquaintances among them so I may be able to improve your reputation a bit for mere %3d percent of your money.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Peace01
Reply.text: I need your help. We've got some irresolvable issues with %2b and now...

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Peace01_npc0
Reply.text: As much as I know, %2b treat you like a maggot. If you pay me %3d percent of your money, I can help you to regain some respect among them.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Hunt00
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Hunt00_npc0
Reply.text: The Hunting season is open. The more enemies you kill, the more money you get. We pay %3d coins for every cold body. You’ll get your reward when the hunt time is over.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Hunt01
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Hunt01_npc0
Reply.text: The bandits really pissed us off! They attack every single car they see. Someone have to teach them a lesson. Shot a couple of them while the people are still angry and you'll get %3d coins for every cold body.
